title: Worms W.M.D + All-Stars Pack (v2.1.0.3) [GOG]
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_worms_wmd_2.1.0.3.exe"
- Run "setup_worms_wmd_all_stars_pack_2.1.0.3.exe"
- Play

Changelog for Patch 1.0.0.86 / GOG-3 (Windows)(added 26 August 2016): 
- A fix has been made to the editor whereby a sprite sheet could be seen when zoomed in 
- Fixed a crash in the editor when selecting â€˜Newâ€™ after having already imported an image 
- Fixes a crash in the editor when selecting refresh 
- Steam overlay not closing when viewing leaderboards on Linux 
- Fixed debug text appearing when a map canâ€™t be downloaded 
- Fix to an issue where players Ranked Points werenâ€™t being updated correctly 
- Fixed OSX and Linux from going into sleep mode whilst the game is running 
- Fix to the unsaved changes dialog appearing when typing Z or X after making an edit 
- Fixed an issue where cancelling to host a game would affect local lobbies 
- Fixed an issue where the game could crash when pressing F4 
- Fix to the issue where audio could get stuck after a replay
